title: Kyouryuu Tankentai Born Free
synopsis: When a meteor crashes to Earth, it briefly changes the climate and dinosaurs once again roam the planet. It's up to a newly formed expedition team to relocate the dinosaurs to a safe environment.
characters: ['Kitayama, Joji', 'Maki, Reiko', 'Koyama, Saburou', 'Masaki, Masao', 'Gonda, Akira', 'Narrator', 'King Butler']
voices: ['Mori, Katsuji', 'Kuri, Youko', 'Kami, Kyounosuke', 'Takahashi, Kazue', 'Kanemoto, Shingo', 'Nakae, Shinji', 'Takiguchi, Junpei']
staff: [['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Shimon, Masato', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
